column1: The Purple Pig////Came here on a friend's recommendation. We stopped by between 3-4pm on a Monday and didn't have to make reservations or wait for a table. Since it was a rather random time to eat
column2: we just ordered a few items: pork belly
column5: and pig ears. The star of the dishes was probably the pork belly since the taste was a little more complex
column6: but the chicken kebabs is a good and safe runner up. While I'd come here again to try other items on the menu
column7: I would not recommend the other two dishes.
